stories.text:
Today, e-commerce agencies are increasingly depending on Product Information Management (PIM) systems to develop, maintain, optimize, and manage product information across customer channels.

This explains why brands and e-commerce agencies are investing heavily in PIM solutions.

As managing large volumes of customers’ product data can get overwhelming, most e-commerce agencies leverage robust PIM solutions to deliver accurate, personalized product information that facilitates upselling and faster resolution of customer issues.

This is primarily due to the rapid advancements in technology that is driving e-commerce growth across the globe.
stories.title: Importance of Product Information Management ( PIM) Systems in ECommerce
